text: This is a list of child actors from India. Movies and/or television series they appeared in are mentioned only if they were still a child at the time of filming. Current child actors (under the age of eighteen) are indicated by boldface. == A == *Anand Krishnamoorthi (born 1980) (credited as Kutty Anand) **Anjali (1990) **May Madham (1994) **Sathi Leelavathi
